DOC.brief_summary: This study design investigate association low- high-glycemic load diet biomarkers hyperglycemia , hyperinsulinemia inflammation , potential biomarkers cancer risk .
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , crossover feed study conduct normal weight overweight individual . Participants give food eat drink ( except water ) two 28-day feeding period ( total 56 day ) . The diet carefully control energy intake regulate maintain weight stability participant . The two feeding period separate 28 day `` washout '' period participant eat food . Dinner eaten Hutchinson Center Monday Friday . Each evening , breakfast , lunch snack bring home next day . On Friday evening food take home weekend . Samples blood collect overnight fast begin end feeding period . All urine collect 24 hour end feed period . A number questionnaires also complete diet period . A small stool sample collect home , first feeding period , feed period . The stool sample collection optional . One decide provide stool sample still participate study .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male female subject 2 . Between age 18 45 3 . BMI 18.5 kg/m2 24 . 9 kg/m2 ( normal weight ) 28.0 kg/m2 39.9 kg/m2 ( overweight ) 4 . Willingness refrain alcohol study 5 . Able come FHCRC Seattle every weekday night dinner 1 . Younger 18 year age old 45 year age . 2 . Do fit one study weight group ( normal weight overweight ) : BMI < 18.5 kg/m2 > 40.0 kg/m2 , 25.0 kg/m2and 27.9 kg/m2 3 . Have disease treat diet and/or medication include limited diabetes , kidney disease , heart disease 4 . Taking prescription medication every day ( include woman take birthcontrol pill , shot , patch IUD hormone ) 5 . Diagnosed treated cancer within previous five year ( except diagnosis and/or treatment nonmelanomatous skin cancer eligible ) 6 . Currently pregnant breastfeed plan pregnancy next 3 month . 7 . Using tobacco product daily basis ( cigarette , pipe , cigar , chew tobacco ) . 8 . Using recreational drug 9 . Drinking follow amount alcohol almost every day : 2 cans/bottles beer OR 2 glass wine OR 3 ounce hard liquor . 10 . Inability ( e.g. , food allergy intolerance ) unwillingness consume food part feed study diet .
